name: Acer Gateway Chromebook 311 CBO311-1H-C1MX Laptop | Intel Celeron N4500 | 11.6" HD (1366 x 768) Display | 4GB LPDDR4X | 64GB eMMC | Wi-Fi 5 802.11ac | Chrome OS | Star Black
short_description: The Best of Google, in a Laptop: Chromebooks run ChromeOS, the fast, secure operating system from Google, with built-in Google apps like Gmail, Gemini, Docs, Photos, YouTube, and more.

Get Google AI Pro, 2TB of Storage, and More for 3 Months at No Cost: Boost your productivity and creativity with 3 months of Google AI Pro -- now including NotebookLM -- on us when you purchase a Chromebook.(1)
Starts Fast, Won't Slow You Down: Chromebooks start up in under 10 seconds, and run automatic updates behind the scenes to deliver performance that’s full speed ahead.
Chat with Gemini: Supercharge your ideas, right from your home screen. Get help planning, writing, learning, and more. (2)
Never Had a Virus - No Need to Worry.(3): Breathe easy knowing your security and privacy are covered with built-in protection and the Titan C2 security chip.
The Apps You Know and Love: Popular apps for streaming, gaming, creating, and staying organized are all available on Google Play. Easily access Microsoft 365(4), Minecraft, Adobe Express, and more.
Intel Celeron N4500 Dual-Core Processor (Up to 2.8GHz) | Intel UHD Graphics | 11.6" HD Widescreen ComfyView Display| 4GB LPDDR4X On-Board Memory | 64GB eMMC
802.11ac Wi-Fi 5 featuring 2x2 MU-MIMO technology (Dual-Band 2.4GHz and 5GHz) | Bluetooth 5.0 | Two Built-in Stereo Speakers | HD Webcam (1280 x 720) supporting 720p HD Audio/Video Recording
1 - USB Type-C port USB 3.2 Gen 1 (up to 5 Gbps) DisplayPort over USB Type-C & USB Charging | 1 - USB 3.2 Gen 1 port

Disclaimers: (1) See Disclaimer below under From the Manufacturer. (2) Check responses for accuracy. Internet connection required. Availability may vary by device, country, and language. (3) As of February 2025 there has been no evidence of any documented, successful virus attack on ChromeOS. Data based on ChromeOS monitoring of various national and internal databases. (4) Additional functionality available with a Microsoft 365 subscription (sold separately). Microsoft, Excel, and PowerPoint are registered trademarks of Microsoft Corporation.

name: Lenovo Chromebook 14 Touchscreen Laptop (14" FHD Touch Display, 8-Core MediaTek Kompanio 520, 4GB RAM, 128GB Storage (64GB eMMC+64GB SD)), Webcam, 13-Hrs Long-Battery Life, Chrome OS, Abyss Blue
short_description: TOP PERFORMANCE, SLEEK DESIGN: Experience smooth multitasking and speedy performance with the Lenovo IdeaPad 3i Touchscreen Chromebook, perfect for work or play on the go.

ALL-DAY BATTERY LIFE FOR UNINTERRUPTED USAGE: The IdeaPad 3i Chromebook offers up to 13 hours of battery life so you can experience the freedom to work and play uninterrupted. Protect your Chromebook from theft and unauthorized access with a physical laptop lock to enjoy peace of mind in any environment.
NATURAL FINGER-TOUCH NAVIGATION: 14" FHD (1920x1080), Anti-glare, 300nits, 100% sRGB, Touchscreen display. Integrated ARM Mali-G52 2EE MC2 GPU; HD 720p camera with Privacy Shutter.
8 YEAR AUTO UPDATE GUARANTEED: 8-core MediaTek Kompanio 520; 4GB Soldered LPDDR4x-3733, 64GB eMMC Storage + 64GB SD Card Attached (Total 128GB Storage). Auto Update Expiration (AUE) Date: June 2032.
MUTLIPLE PORTS MAKE LIFE EASY: USB-C 3.2 Gen 1, USB 3.2 Gen 1, MicroSD card reader, Headphone / mic combo; High Definition (HD) Audio; Wi-Fi 6 11ax 2x2 + Bluetooth 5.1.

DISCLOSURE: This brand-new laptop has been expanded to the advertised storage capacity. Includes a 3-year warranty on the expanded SD Card storage from Issaquah Highlands Tech. 1-year manufacturer warranty covering all other components.

US MIL-STD 810H military-grade standard

product_description: ASUS Chromebook CM14 Flip is made for boosting productivity and having more fun — all day, every day. The 360° hinge provides the flexibility to remote study or work the way you like best. An efficient MediaTek Kompanio 520 processor and up to 14-hour battery life gives you the freedom to stay productive throughout the day. The 14-inch FHD Touchscreen provides an expanded view and supports a garaged USI stylus, enabling intuitive writing for enhanced productivity. Plus, the keyboard, touchpad and palm rest area with ASUS Antimicrobial Guard to inhibit the spread of harmful bacteria, durable build with US military-grade standard and water-resistant keyboard, keep ASUS Chromebook CM14 Flip protected when on the go.

name: Google Pixelbook Go - Lightweight Chromebook Laptop - Up to 12 Hours Battery Life[1] - Touch Screen- Just Black
short_description: Pixelbook Go lets you stay unplugged for up to 12 hours, so you don't need to carry a charger. And when you do need a charge, get up to 2 hours of use in just 20 minutes so you can keep going.
Pixelbook Go is lightweight – barely 1kg. It’s 13 mm thin with a grippable design, making it easier to carry

Pixelbook Go starts up in seconds, and makes working a breeze. The 8th Gen Intel Core processor is built for speed and responsiveness, powering everything you do. And when you need quick help, just ask Google.

Pixelbook Go is designed to prevent things from getting off track. The Titan C security chip and built-in anti-virus software help protect your data. And Chrome OS updates automatically, always giving you the latest features and security.

A backlit keyboard and Hush Keys make using Pixelbook Go comfortable and quiet. The touchpad is spacious and accurate, so you only need to use a light touch. The fanless design stays cool to let you comfortably use it on your lap.
With up to 8.3 million pixels and dual stereo speakers, you get amazing picture and sound for watching movies, editing photos, or video chatting.
product_description: Google Pixelbook Go packaged with a Google Seal for Online Marketplace Pixelbook Go is the Chromebook laptop designed for your life on the go. It’s barely 2 pounds[3] and 13 mm thin, with up to 12 hours of battery life.[1] An 8th Gen Intel Core Processor and Chrome OS keep you moving fast.[5] The Titan C security chip and built-in antivirus software help protect your data, so you can go without worry.[4] And it works with Google Pixel, so you can get online easily on your Pixelbook Go or Pixel Slate using your Pixel’s LTE connection and do more on the go. [1] Up to 12 hours of use. Battery performance is based on a mix of standby, web browsing and other use. Actual results may vary. [2] Battery performance is based on a mix of video, web browsing, productivity and other use. Charging time requires the battery to be at least 5% charged, the device to be inactive and use of included charger. Actual results may vary. [3] Weight varies by configuration and manufacturing process. [4] Auto-updates and auto backup require an Internet connection. [5] Intel and Intel Core are trademarks of Intel Corporation in the U.S. and/or other countries. [6] To make calls, Google Duo accounts required for you and call recipient.

name: HP OmniBook X Flip Copilot+ PC Laptop Computer, 2-in-1 16" Touchscreen Laptop, AMD Ryzen AI 5, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, Microsoft 365 Office Lifetime + Stylus Pen, USB Hub, Backlit KB, WiFi 6 + BT, Win 11
short_description: [Windows AI - Copilot + PC] Copilot+ PC will bring exclusive on-device AI experiences designed to accelerate productivity and creativity. Windows Copilot uses artificial intelligence to increase productivity in different ways. Windows PCs have access via the internet to Copilot, a cloud-based AI assistant. Copilot+ PCs bring additional AI features right to your PC without internet. Next Gen AI Apps - The new HP AI Companion app increases your productivity with a collection of AI tools and solutions.

[High Performance + Powerful Graphics] Powerhouse Performance with AMD Ryzen AI - AMD Ryzen AI 5 340 processor + AMD Radeon 840M graphics deliver trusted speed and efficiency for multitasking, gaming, and AI-driven workflows. Unlock transformational AI PC experiences with an AMD Ryzen AI processor. Designed for creators to experience pure speed, responsiveness, and power efficient AI processing for Copilot+ PCs. Built in for thrilling gaming performance, high resolution display support and hardware accelerated encoding with or without a discrete graphics card.

[Ultr Portable 2-in-1 Design + Outstanding 2K 16 inch FHD Touchscreen] Bigger is always better with a vibrant 1920 x 1200 resolution screen and 178-degree wide-viewing angles. Multitouch-enabled, IPS (in-plane switching), edge-to-edge glass. Intuitive touchscreen technology lets you control your PC right from the screen. To make what you create look even better, AMD FreeSync optimizes refresh rates for flawless sync with your graphics.

[Superior Storage + Long battery life] 16GB RAM - Low power double data rate 5x memory optimizes a mobile laptop device for smooth and frequent actions, ensuring it meets the needs for high performance and efficient power consumption. 512GB SSD Storage - With high speed data transfer, the PCIe Gen4 NVMe M.2 SSD offers fast speed and efficient storage. Up to 21 hours video playback battery life gives you the endurance to work and create at any time. HP Fast Charge refuels 50% battery in 30 minutes, while AMD Ryzen AI optimizes power efficiency.

[Professional Multimedia Experience] Poly studio audio with dual speakers, you'll get the best experience to collaborate anywhere with audio tuned by Poly Studio. And DTS: X Ultra Technology - Spatially accurate, 3D sound drops you into the middle of your favorite games, movies, and music with a level of depth and immersion you can feel. Take visually stunning works of art with HP 5MP IR Camera with HDR Switch capabilities. With High Dynamic Range and 16:10 aspect ratio you get HD content natively, so you can capture more gradients between lights and darks for truer color accuracy.

[Enhanced Connectivity and Versatility] Multiple Ports Available: 1x USB Type-C 4, 1x USB Type-C 3.1, 2x USB Type-A 3.1, 1x headphone/microphone combo, 1x HDMI 2.1. Backlit keyboard, Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth, Windows 11 Home operating system, enable flexible and high-speed connections to various devices and networks.

name: Laptop Computer Intel N150, 15.6in IPS FHD, 3.6GHz, 16GB RAM 1TB SSD, 13th Gen Intel Twin Lake Quad Core N150 (Upgraded N100), Webcam, Backlit Full Keyboard, Touchpad, Student/Home/Business
short_description: ✔ Run Lightning Fast — FIREBAT laptop is equipped with the Intel 13th Generation processor Twin Lake N150 (2025 New Releases, 4 cores/4 threads, 6MB smart cache, turbo speed up to 3.6GHz) and enhanced Super Fin technology. It offers a more powerful performance improvement, more than 30% higher than that of the 12th-generation (N100, N97, N95) and more than 60% higher than that of the 11th-generation(N5105, N5095, J4125).

✔ Connect It All — FIREBAT laptop features an SD Card Slot, an HDMI 2.1 Interface, two USB-A 3.2 Gen1 5Gbps ports, a USB-A 3.2 Gen2 10Gbps port, a USB-C 3.2 Gen2 10Gbps interface, a Kensington lock, a 3.5mm headphone jack, a 1Gbps RJ45 LAN Interface, Wi-Fi 5, and Bluetooth 4.2. It supports an external display.

✔ Greater Picture Quality And Sound Effects — FIREBAT laptop has a high-end, modern, and simple appearance, and is equipped with a 15.6-inch IPS 16:9 display (1920×1080) with slim bezels. Photos and videos are rich in contrast, with sharp details and clearer text. The 2-megapixel central camera, microphone, and 2 x 8Ω/1W stereo speakers provide amazing picture quality and sound effects.

✔ Large-Capacity Storage — FIREBAT laptop is equipped with 16GB SO-DIMM single-channel memory, which can be upgraded to 32GB, and is equipped with a 1TB M.2 SSD, which brings fast startup, fast file transfer, and smooth multitasking experience. The large-capacity storage means you don't have to worry about the storage space for files and information in the future, or the problem of slow operation and jamming due to insufficient capacity.

✔ Ultra-Long Battery Life — Equipped with a 5000mAh 38Wh large-capacity battery, the FIREBAT notebook can provide the same excellent performance whether it is powered by battery or connected to a power source.

✔ FIREBAT For And By Computer Users — Whether for home, business, education, or gaming, FIREBAT can always meet your needs. FIREBAT has been deeply involved in the field of computers and accessories for more than ten years. As a professional manufacturer, we pay more attention to the quality and performance of our products. We will continue to provide more and better products to bring more convenience and fun to your life. We stand by for you (support@firebatpc DOT com; www.firebatpc DOT com)
Model Number: AT15, Brand: FIREBAT, Manufacturer: Shenzhen Qingfen Tingxiu Information Technology Co., Ltd.

name: Lenovo Chromebook C330 2-in-1 Convertible Laptop, 11.6" HD Display, MediaTek MT8173C, 4GB RAM, 64GB Storage, Chrome OS, Blizzard White
short_description: Aspect Ratio:16:9
Get high performance when you need it – The Chromebook C330 boots up in seconds and features easy-to-use Chrome OS, plenty of memory and storage, and so much more

Sleek, stylish, and secure, this 360⁰ convertible laptop is less than 1-inch thin and about the weight of a hardback book, with an 11-inch touchscreen display that's perfect for day-to-day computing and multimedia, on or offline

The Lenovo Chromebook C330 is easy to use, offers built-in virus protection and keeps going with long battery life. No setup needed – Just login with a Google account so emails, maps, documents, and photos stay with you via cloud storage
Built to connect, this notebook computer includes a variety of USB ports for effortless connectivity. Plus, stay in touch with the built-in camera. Bluetooth 4.2
product_description: Faster, simpler, and more secure, the Lenovo Chromebook C330 brings the latest Chromebook features to you in a sleek, stylish, and durable Blizzard White convertible design. With its seamless Integration with all your Google accounts, this notebook is built for collaboration – among family, in the classroom, or at the office. Offering the latest multimedia in high-definition, this convertible Chromebook features a 10-point touchscreen IPS display for easy viewing in tent, tablet, stand, or laptop mode. You'll enjoy the latest streaming show anywhere you want to watch. Never slowing down and always up to date, The Lenovo Chromebook C330 offers the latest in digital security while delivering perfect day-to-day performance. Virus protection is built in, and your computer will update about every six weeks, when you have an internet connection. You'll get the latest operating system updates automatically, so there's no need to worry about keeping your software up to date. Part laptop and part tablet, This Lenovo Chromebook is perfect for a straight-forward PC to use at home, college students looking for a quick and lightweight solution for taking notes and streaming videos, or the busy on-the-go professional who needs access to all of those shared documents. What's more, you can enjoy the best Google has to offer, standard on your Chromebook, with access to a variety of Google play store apps. The Chromebook C330 delivers powerful processing with integrated graphics, em storage, and DDR3 memory – all with up to 10 hours of battery life. At only 2. 64 lbs, it won't weigh you down.
